resources.string: What is the important situation or event?
Think of an important situation or event that is stressful or that you often avoid. Be as specific as possible.
What do you want to remind yourself of when this happens?
Specifically, what do you want to think or do when this happens? What would you say to yourself or what is your action plan?
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS reminders(_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, card_id INTEGER, year INTEGER, month INTEGER, day INTEGER, hour INTEGER, minute INTEGER, second INTEGER);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS cards(_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, event TEXT, reminder TEXT);
